headline: International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Why International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) is on investors’ radar International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) has attracted attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing mixed returns over the past week, month, and past 3 months. Across a longer horizon, IFF’s performance has differed from shorter term trading. The company reports annual revenue of US$11.1b and a net income loss of US$472 million. headline: International Flavors And Fragrances Uses WEF Stage To Support Turnaround
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) is taking part in the World Economic Forum, engaging with global business and policy leaders. The appearance comes during a period of declining sales and financial pressures for the company. Management is using the event to discuss industry trends, potential partnerships, and approaches to ongoing operational challenges. IFF operates at the center of the global flavors, fragrances, and ingredients market, supplying consumer goods makers across...
